data.title: Love Actually
data.text:
21 Of The Most Unlikable Movie Characters Of All Time

You're going to need to do some deep, meditative breathing to get through this list of characters.

17 Inappropriate Actor Age Gaps In TV Shows And Movies Between Adult And Child "Couples"

Ashton Kutcher's costar bet him $10 to kiss Mila Kunis with tongue during their first kiss on That '70s Show. He was 20, and she was 14.

These 17 Actors Starred In Hit 2003 Movies As Kids — Here's What They're Up To Now

I still haven't fully processed 2003 being 20 years ago...

"Love Actually" Is 20 Years Old, So Here's 18 Surprising Things About The Film You Might've Not Known

There was almost an alternate ending to the film, but it would've been too difficult to film...

20 "Love Actually" Cast Members At The Film's Premieres Vs. Recent Appearances

It's officially Love Actually rewatch season!

Quiz

Prep For A Christmas Movie Night And We'll Confirm Which 'Bluey' Character Is Your Spirit Animal

Bluey saying, "Nice parking spot Rita" has the same energy as the "Thanks a lot, Rachel!" girl. You can't change my mind.

"Bridget Jones's Dairy" And "Love Actually" Writer Says Fat Jokes In His Films Were "Behind The Curve"

Richard Curtis revealed what his daughter said that caused him to reconsider those jokes.

23 Examples Of A "Celebrity Paradox" In Film And TV That Might Just Make You Say, "Damn, That's Cool"

Is it Taylor Swift or Elaine... You decide.

22 On-Screen Weddings That Are So Perfect They'd Never Happen In Real Life

*Adds every image to Pinterest board.*

16 Truly Clever Movie Moments From 2003 That'll Make You Say: "Damn — They Really Cared About Every Little Thing"

I've said it before and I'll say it again: The Matrix movies from '03 were really, really clever.

63 Behind-The-Scenes Movie Facts That Are Adorable, Heartwarming, Or Just Plain Cute

If I were a director, I, too, would put my pet in every movie I made.

19 Of The Best Rom-Com Christmas Films

It's all about jingle bells and cheese.

Here Are The Most Overrated Christmas Movies According To Movie Fans, And I'm Curious If You Agree With Them

These not-so-favorite films landed on their naughty list.

7 Christmas Sequels That I Think We Could've Done Without, And 7 That I'd Like Hollywood To Start On Immediately

Gimme 1 or 2 any day, but I draw the line at 3.

Quiz

I Disney-Fied 14 Christmas Movie Character And I'm Challenging You To Work Out The Christmas Movie They're From

It's beginning to look a lot like Disney...

The 37 Christmas Movies You Need To Watch Before The Holiday Season Ends

Here's a holly jolly watchlist.

We Ranked Male Rom-Com Leads Based On If They Could Pull Off Saying “Good Girl,” And We Really Want To Know If You Agree

Steve Carell in The 40-Year-Old Virgin can never say "good girl," but Steve Carell in Crazy, Stupid, Love...now that's a completely different story.

Quiz

Think About It, What Is Anyone ~Actually~ Called In "Love Actually" – I Bet You Can't Guess Even 5 Character's Names

No names, just vibes.

Here Are 18 Christmas Things That I Personally Believe Should Exist All Year Round

Mince pies can stay a once-a-year thing though.

This Is Why The Guy With The Cue Cards In “Love Actually” Isn’t The Creepy Christmas Villain That You Think He Is

It’s a self-preservation thing.

"Love Actually" Came Out 20 Years Ago, I'm Ancient, Here's What The Cast Looks Like, And I'm Gonna Go Cry Now

Time, actually, is flying by us at alarming speeds.

Hugh Grant Has A Very Funny Reason Why Filming His "Love Actually" Dancing Scene Was "Excruciating"

"I saw it in the script and I thought, 'Well, I'll hate doing that.' I didn't fancy doing the dance at all, let alone rehearsing it."

Quiz

We'll Tell You What Christmas Movie To Watch Based On This Holiday Food Quiz

Christmas season starts NOW! Get your decorations out.

14 Moments From Popular Movies That Were 100% Problematic And Disturbing

Dissect and dissent is the new rise and shine.

Cute

37 Iconic Movies That Aged As Poorly As Unrefrigerated Cottage Cheese

I'm shocked by how many messed-up things happened in Sixteen Candles.

27 Actors Who Have Major Regrets About Certain Roles They've Played

Some of these roles never should've been written.

25 Times Hollywood Thought It Was Completely Appropriate To Cast A Teenager And An Adult As Love Interests

I need to speak to the casting director of A Cinderella Story.

Quiz

You Can Only Save One Christmas Movie From Each Decade — The Rest Will Disappear Forever

I'd save The Polar Express and get rid of Elf, The Holiday, and Love Actually.

22 Characters That Are Essential To Christmas Movies

If the main character is a high flying businesswoman who hates Christmas, you know the film's gonna be good.

19 Moments From Popular Rom-Com Movies That Were 100% Problematic And Disturbing

Nate from The Devil Wears Prada did NOT deserve Andy.

50 Details From '00s And Early '10s Movies That Are As Smart As They Are Subtle

In Iron Man 2, the language in War Machine's suit changes to Russian when his armor gets compromised.

The Little Drummer Boy From "Love Actually" Aged Like A Fine Wine, And 17 Other Transformations By Popular Christmas Movie Actors

Jude Law's daughter from The Holiday (2006) is a grown woman now!!!

Quiz

"The Holiday" And "Love Actually" Are Iconic Christmas Movies, But How Much Do You Really Know About Them Both?

Only people with real ~gumption~ should attempt this quiz.

19 Películas que envejecieron terriblemente mal

"Los covers de Alvin y las ardillas son peores que en Glee".

15 Momentos de pelis dosmileras que creímos románticos pero la neta son red flags

Alexa, pon "Bad Romance" de Lady Gaga.

Why Movies Like “Clueless,” “Love Actually,” And “Grease” Just Don’t Hold Up Anymore

“I think you can still enjoy things, but it really depends on how much of it is problematic and the way in which you’re consuming it.”

Yep, lxs niñxs de las pelis navideñas que vemos cada año ya crecieron...¡un buen!

Dato curioso: el encantador Fuller, de Mi pobre angelito, ahora es un magnate canijillo en Succession.

17 Romantic Comedies Where Characters Made Absolutely Baffling Decisions

You simply couldn't get away these things in real life.

Quiz

👏👏HIRE 👏👏MORE👏👏 FEMALE 👏👏ROM-COM 👏👏WRITERS!!!👏👏
